metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0326 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high.
metadata.Description: In p2p_copy_client_info of p2p.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution if the target device is performing a Wi-Fi Direct search, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-8.1 Android-9Android ID: A-172937525

criterions.comment: wpa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
wpa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
